member.summary: Uses Shell to get the users selection(s) within Windows Explorer/Internet Explorer.

member.summary: Gets the current snapshot of watched windows.

member.summary: Occurs when a watched window's path changes.

member.summary: Occurs when the watcher stops unexpectedly.

member.summary: Occurs when an error is encountered while polling windows.

member.summary: Requests that the polling abort.

member.summary: Performs a poll of open shell windows.
